body_html:
Thank you @CNugteren. It's never too late.

I added your snippet in <app_name>/tests/__init__.py.

Now, I need to do: ./manage.py test <app_name>.tests to run the tests.
Not just ./manage.py test or ./manage.py test <app_name>, otherwise the logs will appear again.
body_text:
Thank you @CNugteren. It's never too late.
I added your snippet in <app_name>/tests/__init__.py.
Now, I need to do: ./manage.py test <app_name>.tests to run the tests.
Not just ./manage.py test or ./manage.py test <app_name>, otherwise the logs will appear again.
body:
Thank you @CNugteren. It's never too late.

I added your snippet in `<app_name>/tests/__init__.py`.

Now, I need to do: `./manage.py test <app_name>.tests` to run the tests.
Not just `./manage.py test` or `./manage.py test <app_name>`, otherwise the logs will appear again.
